title: Riu Palace Costa Rica receives the Crystal Apple Award for Best Staff and Service for the third consecutive yearTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Riu Palace Costa Rica receives the Crystal Apple Award for Best Staff and Service for the third consecutive year  
Once again, RIU Hotels & Resorts have shone at the 2015 Golden Apple Awards . This year, the hotel chain has been distinguished with no fewer than 21 awards by US tour operator Apple Vacations . One of them, the Crystal Apple Award for Best Staff and Service in Central America, has gone to the Riu Palace Costa Rica . Furthermore 20 other RIU hotels in Mexico (10), the Dominican Republic (4), Jamaica (2), Panama (1), Aruba (1), St. Martin (1) and Bahamas (1) have received a Golden Apple Award. 
 
 
The Golden Apple Award and the Crystal Apple Award are two of the most sought-after distinctions in the tourism industry since they are awarded based upon an Apple satisfaction questionnaire filled in by hundreds of thousands of travellers. In this questionnaire, guests rate the staff, service, food quality, facilities, beaches and entertainment. The highest rated hotels are distinguished with a Golden Apple Award , while the hotel considered to be top in its category receives the Crystal Apple Award , the most prestigious Apple Vacations award.
 
 
“I and the whole Riu Palace Costa Rica team are honoured to receive this award, which recognises our daily effort to make our guests happy during their stay with us. This award encourages us to work even harder to continue to meet our guests’ expectations and maintain their trust”, stated Wim Bracke, General Manager of the Riu Palace Costa Rica Hotel, when he collected the award. 
 
 
Over the past four years, RIU has doubled the number of accolades received during this ceremony. This is a record figure that recognises RIU’s commitment to quality and the extent to which guests are welcoming the new style of decor and services RIU is introducing throughout its new resorts and major refurbishment projects. 
 
 
The Riu Palace Costa Rica is located on the seafront in Playa Matapalo, in the beautiful Pacific coast region of Guanacaste. Opened in November 2012, the hotel has 538 rooms, the recognised RIU All Inclusive 24-Hour Service and a wide variety of quality food and drink at its five restaurants and five bars. 
 
 
In the photo (from left to right): Javier Monje (Contracting Director Mexico & Costa Rica for RIU); Joachim Schoenfeldt (VP Contracting & Sales International for RIU); Armin Kaestner (VP Contracting & Sales USA and Canada for RIU); Hugo Aguilera (Director of Partner Marketing & Business Development for RIU); Wim Bracket (General Manager of Riu Palace Costa Rica Hotel) along with Jacqueline Kuehnel (VP of Product Development, Apple Leisure Group).
